name: Jumping Jacks
description: A full-body cardio move involving jumping with arms and legs moving out and in.

name: Squats
description: A lower body move targeting quads, glutes, hamstrings, and calves.

name: Push-Ups
description: A classic upper body move focusing on chest, triceps, and shoulders.

name: Lunges
description: A unilateral lower body movement improving balance and strength.

name: Modified Burpee
description: Bend the knees, place hands on the floor, walk left leg then right leg back into a plank position. Then walk the legs back up and return to standing.

name: Bicycle Crunches
description: Lie on your back, place hands lightly behind your neck, and move your legs in a pedaling motion while crunching your torso to touch your opposite elbow to the opposite knee, targeting the core, quads, and glutes.
